import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Header, Footer, LazyLoadImg, VideoPlayer, BasicSlider, ScrollButton } from '../../components'; import { bodies_icon, menu_icon4, gadgets, locations, guns, vehicles, lock_bg, lock_dark, f8_fury, granted, welcome, case_mark, lock_screen, case_mark_dark, red_bar, } from '../../assets/images'; import { charDataTab1, settingsTab1, charDataTab3, settingsTab3, } from './Data'; import { Container, Col, Row, Tab, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap'; import placeholder from '../../assets/video/placeholder.mov'; const tabItems = [ { eventKey: 'the-first', img: menu_icon4, hd: 'The First' }, { eventKey: 'vehicles', img: vehicles, hd: 'Vehicles' }, { eventKey: 'locations', img: locations, hd: 'Locations' }, { eventKey: 'guns', img: guns, hd: 'Guns' }, { eventKey: 'badges', img: bodies_icon, hd: 'Badges' }, { eventKey: 'gadgets', img: gadgets, hd: 'Gadgets' }, ]; function Metaverse() { useEffect(() => { document.title = "Planet Tota Metaverse | PlanerTota" }); return ( <>
